```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

instacart = 
    instacart %>%
sample_n(5000)

instacart %>%
    mutate(text_label = str_c("Order Hour of Day", order_hour_of_day)) %>%
    plot_ly (
        x = ~aisle, y = ~order_dow, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~order_hour_of_day, text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.5)
```


```{r}
plot = instacart %>%
    count(aisle) %>%
    mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>%
    top_n(10) %>%
    plot_ly (
        x = ~aisle, y = ~n, type = "bar", color = ~aisle)
```
